SELECT B.RECORD_ID AS recordId, B.VOLUME_ID AS volumeId,V.VOLUME_TITLE AS volumeTitle,V.VOLUME_CODE AS volumeCode,V.CREATE_ORG AS createOrg, B.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime,B.END_TIME AS endTime,B.APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus,B.APPROVAL_USER AS approvalUser,B.APPROVAL_TIME AS approvalTime, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=B.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName FROM ARCHIVES_BORROW_VOLUME B LEFT JOIN ARCHIVES_VOLUME V ON B.ORG_ID=V.ORG_ID AND B.VOLUME_ID=V.VOLUME_ID WHERE B.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND B.APPROVAL_STATUS = '0'
AND B.APPROVAL_USER=#{accountId}
